node.title: Carnarvon residents describe man taken into police custody over Cleo Smith disapperance
node.alt: A police car and crime scene on a residential street
node.description: Local residents give details about the man living in the house where Western Australia Police found Cleo Smith.
node.content:
["Details have begun to emerge of the man living at the house where four-year-old Cleo Smith, who went missing two-and-a-half weeks ago, was found on Wednesday.", "The recovery of the little girl after her disappearance while camping with her family near the town of Carnarvon saw national and international outpourings of relief.", "When police kicked down the door of a Department of Communities housing property on Tonkin Crescent, on the western edge of the town of Carnarvon, they discovered Cleo inside.", "She's since been reunited with her parents, and police say they have taken a 36-year-old man into custody.", "", "
Missing girl Cleo Smith, who vanished from the Blowholes campsite on October 16, was found yesterday.\u00a0(Facebook: Ellie Smith)
", "Residents on the street have described an overweight Indigenous\u00a0man with long, curly black hair and average height going in and out of the property in the past two weeks.", "One resident, who asked not to be named, said he heard a loud thumping on Tuesday night, which he believed was police knocking down the door.", "But he said over the past few weeks there had been no other sounds from the house.", "", "
Police broke down the door to this property where they found Cleo.\u00a0(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "Another resident, who asked not to be named, said she had seen a man come and go from the house, and had only just spoken to him on Monday.", "\"I just saw him in and out, by his house,\" she said.", "\"He's a big, fat bloke.", "She said she wasn't sure if he had a job, but he had a nice car.\u00a0A blue Mazda sedan sat in the driveway of the home on Wednesday.", "", "
The car parked at the house where Cleo Smith was found.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "Police have spoken of a car described by one witness as a sedan, spotted leaving the Blowholes at around 3am on October 16, which they had not been able to account for.", "The ABC does not have any evidence that this is the same vehicle.", "Residents on the street varied in their estimate of how long this man had lived there, with most of those questioned saying they thought it was between six months and a year.", "Another resident on the street said she saw the man coming and going, and he \"always looked like he was in a rush\".", "\"My mum asked him for a lift,\" she said.", "\"She didn't think there was anything suspicious.\"", "She said in the past few weeks, the house had mostly had the lights off.", "Police have not confirmed precisely what led them to the home on\u00a0Tonkin Crescent in the early hours of Wednesday morning.", "", "
Forensic officers were gathering evidence at a house in Carnarvon on November 3, 2021, after missing four-year-old girl Cleo Smith was found at the property overnight.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "A 36-year-old man taken into custody was later taken to the Carnarvon regional hospital. Police said\u00a0they anticipated charges would be laid, as yet they have not laid any.", "Cleo was yesterday reunited with her parents in hospital. Police described her as healthy and well.", "WA Premier Mark McGowan is expected to arrive in Carnarvon later today to thank the police team involved in the search efforts."]
